content: @Heather Macbeth and @Yury G. Kudryashov, can you specify what needs / you want to be done here in #5094? I'm happy to do it.
Heather wants to restore the old proof of find_specified_factor in terms of ZMod. I suggest that we have 2 proofs.
If you don't do it today, then I can do it nowtomorrow
